content: Hello! Would anyone be interested in joining a zoom call after tomorrow's triage meeting? I'd like to consider documenting the design considerations and range of proposals that went into design decisions for async/await. I know this has been discussed in many different forums (rfcs, issues, zulip conversations, etc) and I'd like us to hop on a call and brainstorm about where that information is and how we can link to it/consolidate it in one place.
This could perhaps be an addition to https://rust-lang.github.io/async-book/01_getting_started/01_chapter.html
In my imagining, it would be a separate mdbook, on the https://github.com/rust-lang/wg-async-foundations repo
I imagine we'd have sections for all the things we might do, e.g. stabilize stream trait, generator syntax, etc
but I guess we can start by documenting some of the things from the async interviews
cc @tmandry and perhaps the rest of @WG-async-foundations btw
Sorry, I was off yesterday. I'd be happy to jump on a call later, though I wasn't involved for a lot of the design groundwork.
Heh neither was I, that seems fine
Well, I plan to do this either way
I'd be happy to have others join ;)
